website_summaries.verdict: Combats both reflux and excessive air intake with a unique angled design and bottom vent technology. Ideal for heavy spitters who suffer with colic as well.
pros: Strategically placed angles enable upright feeding, reducing reflux and minimizing the risk of ear infections
Bottom vent draws air away from milk for a happier digestive system
Wide, textured nipples help babies get a secure latch
Easy to clean and relatively easy to assemble
cons: Screw on base can leak if not properly aligned
Base can become excessively hot when placed in a bottle warmer

customer_reviews.title: Not sure about the sender of these. They look ...
customer_reviews.text: Not sure about the sender of these. They look new and unused but the box was taped shut with scotch tape and bottles were just thrown in the box! Will be testing if they leak before use and if they dont leak i guess will be sterilizing them but i feel used bottles shouldnt be sold as new! Also im confused why they say playtex baby and not playtex ventaire? Are they not the real thing?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I have the 6 oz bottles and have used them since my daughter was born so buying the 9 oz bottles was a no-brainer. I will tell you because I didn't see it but these bottles have the medium flow nipples. My daughter still uses the slow so that might be something to watch out for. I would recommend these bottles to anyone with a new baby or anyone in general looking to try a new bottle. The angle is great and was a huge help with gas in my house.
customer_reviews.author: thelizwiley

customer_reviews.title: Extra pieces to take apart and wash plus cap can squash the nipple
customer_reviews.text: I assume this helps my baby not colic, or not have gas. I got them because they were reasonably priced and I like that it is angled so you can get that last little bit of milk out. However I didn't realize there's an extra rubber valve in the base part; so 1 more part to wash or put in the top rack. Also the cap has a ridge to fit around the nipple and hold it in place, I don't know why since the cap should prevent anything from nudging that anyways while it is on. Instead it makes it harder to put on and more likely to put on wrong and squash the nipping.
customer_reviews.author: Erin L. Reeves

customer_reviews.title: Leaks. Leaks. Leaks.
customer_reviews.text: Horrible. Just received these last week and have tried them for two days. Two of the five bottles leak horribly. I have tried to re-install the rubber piece in the bottom to make sure the suction is there and it seems to be until you put liquid in it and let it sit for a minute then all of a sudden there’s milk underneath the bottle. I do like that they keep most of the air out of the bottle but in doing so they also leak from the bottom. Will not purchase again, now I need to find new bottles and can’t return them because they’re used.
customer_reviews.author: PW

customer_reviews.title: Easy for baby, more parts to clean for parents
customer_reviews.text: These were our sons favorite bottle. I subtracted a star because one of the values tore and became unfunctional. Also because the caps pop off too easily and causes leaks. It would be more ideal of thr nipple was like a sippie cup self sealing slit vs open hole that drips if bottle os tipped. It’s a total of 5 parts to clean per bottle (6 if you count cap) Even babies with a tongue tie can still drink with no problem from these bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Mamaa4444

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: The bottle design is nice. It fits nice in my hands when feeding. The bottom comes off and it kind of makes it easy to clean. The only downside I can sort of see is that the "colic vent" at the bottom is slow to vent air in. The bottom vent works but air still gets in through the rubber nipple. Regardless, I would still recommend these. They seem like good quality. I have to comment. I switched the nipples with the slow flow version from this same company and they fit perfectly. Maybe that's why the vent doesn't work perfectly? I don't know
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: I don't think they are original...
customer_reviews.text: I don't think they are original... They look very similar but not quite and they do let the air out and they leave at the lid. The original bottles you can hear the air go out the bottom and no bubbles float from the nipple.... These bottles the nipple gets sucked in and baby had gas bubbles. These don't work like supposed to... Gives the bottle and brand a bad name...
customer_reviews.author: Becca

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as Dr Browns
customer_reviews.text: Our son struggled with these. Not only do they leak VERY often, but the nipple is too soft I think. It's noticeably more "bendy" than the more firm Dr. Brown's nipples and can be pushed down in toward the bottle while baby is trying to eat. Our 2 month old has a hard time getting anything out because of that. He sucks for a while and makes us think he has eaten a good amount but when we take the bottle away there is hardly anything gone yet.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cleaning is Time Consuming
customer_reviews.text: It should be said that they are easy but at times tedious to clean. Being able to take out the bottoms of the bottle helps make sure that every aspect of the bottle is clean and sterile but when you are boiling five pieces per bottle... that takes a lot of time. That’s my only complaint, so if taking more time to sterilize more pieces is not a issue for you- like you have a sterling unite and you’re not boiling them on a stove top like me- then these are excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: So Dissappointed
customer_reviews.text: I have used Avent bottles in the past and I have had nothing but great experiences. Then I ordered these for my son ahead of me giving birth and I wish I didn't. I spent this money on these bottles and every one of them leaks. No matter how tight I screw the tops & bottoms I still have leakage from the bottles. I really wanted to love these bottles because they are so easy to clean and put together. Maybe mine are just defective but I have to throw these away.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: We used playtex ventaire bottles 15 years ago with our first child, worked great!! Now we are using them again with our second, still a great product!! I read reviews beforehand to find the best bottle now, I would put this at the top of the list, no complaints and when I have read complaints about these bottles, I have experienced none of those problems. Great product, highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Smith

customer_reviews.title: I like the playtex brand, but it's not slow flow like it says
customer_reviews.text: Giving 2 stars because these were supposed to be slow flow nipples as written on the box and in the description, but every nipple in this package has medium written on it and it's too fast for my newborn. I've literally had to box these back up and leave them on my shelf until she's older (because I do like the brand). I had to go out and purchase the Dr. Brown slow flow bottles for now. Please sell and ship what's advertised Platex/Amazon. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Gabbie's G4

customer_reviews.title: Good bottles but...
customer_reviews.text: These are good bottles. They seem to vent the air as advertised and the nipple does not collapse. It’s also slim enough that my baby can hold it comfortably herself. I am surprised, however, that whoever designed this bottle did not take into account water rising when formula powder is added. You simply CANNOT add scoops of formula powder to a bottle filled with 9 oz of water. There isn’t enough extra room in the bottle! The most you can make is 7 oz.
customer_reviews.author: D. Czerwinski

customer_reviews.title: Great For Reflux Babies
customer_reviews.text: SWEAR by these! My son has reflux and was spitting up a lot and getting super gassy after feeding from other bottles. As soon as we switched to these; he was so much happier! The bottle does have several parts which makes washing a little more complicated than a traditional bottle but nothing too crazy. Only complaint is that water gets stuck in the base of the bottle (where the base screws into the bottle) when heated in a bottle warmer and will drip out onto your hand or baby when feeding. This can be dangerous with the hot water!
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn D

customer_reviews.title: Helped my son with his reflux
customer_reviews.text: My sister used these bottles with her 3 kids so I thought I'd try them. Between these and switching to an off brand of formula, my son no longer had reflux issues! Downside to them is the disassembly for washing and reassembly before use. But I'll take that over constant spit up any day! I bought 2 packs and wash then once or twice a day. Once they dry, I put thethem back together and put water in them so it's easier to put powdered formula in when baby gets hungry and is crying! Makes life so much easier that way!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonShopperOhio

customer_reviews.title: The best set
customer_reviews.text: Definitely not easy to clean, but the baby doesn't take in so much air with these. With other brands he always let out such great big burps and would get really gassy. I recommend these for newborns. I breast and bottle fed for 3 months and there was no confusion between them. They are not easy to clean though I recommend a dishwasher to clean these every time or u will not get all the crannies clean.
customer_reviews.author: SunnyTop Contributor: Calligraphy

customer_reviews.title: several parts to clean & holds bottle warmer water in the base creating a burn hazard
customer_reviews.text: We bought these because of the angle. They're easier for the baby to eat and easier for us to hold on to than the Avent 9oz bottles b/c they are slimmer. The only complaints I have about these bottles is that there are more parts to disassemble and clean, and when I put it in the warmer it holds hot water in the base so that when tipped up to feed baby the hot water runs down my arm - I have to remember to do that before feeding the baby so as not to burn him.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie F.

customer_reviews.title: Leak
customer_reviews.text: I have the smaller version of these bottles and love them, these on the other hand, leak and have a medium flow nipple. I don’t mine the nipple for formula but it’s too fast for my daughter at 1 month for breast milk.
customer_reviews.author: ashley Weatherwalks

customer_reviews.title: LIFE SAVER
customer_reviews.text: This seriously helped so much; my sister in law told me to get these because my dr brown bottles were causing my baby so much gas and pain. She was staying up ALL NIGHT. These bottles totally helped and she started sleeping 5-6 hours a night at 3 weeks old. Best change I ever made!
customer_reviews.author: Teacher Mom

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste time on these buy a better quality baby bottle
customer_reviews.text: Do not waste your money! These leak alot after just a few uses. There are alot of pieces to wash and assemble. They don't seem to work that well. Compared to the doctor brown bottles we got at our shower. We ended up loving and buying more doctor brown bottles. They really hold up Don't waste time on these buy a better quality brand baby bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin & Gloria

customer_reviews.title: Nipple is flimsy
customer_reviews.text: The nipple is extremely flimsy. My 3mo old has a very hard time with them and we've used multiple different types of bottles with no issues. These on the other hand are just not working. I wish I could return them but I already threw away the box. Were on day 3 of these and no improvement. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: victoria

customer_reviews.title: My favorite.
customer_reviews.text: These are my favortie bottles. Used them with all my babies and I tried a ton of other bottles with my first because he spit up a ton and these were the only bottles that seemed to help. Your baby will still get some air but these definetly were the best. Also they are way more convinent to hold while feeding. The only thing I dislike is all the pieces to wash.
customer_reviews.author: C Hardy

customer_reviews.title: Great bottles, but came in an open package
customer_reviews.text: The picture of the box says slow flow nipple. It’s medium. Also the packaging looked like it was used. I’ve bought many of these bottles I know how it’s supposed to look. It was a mess Bottles look new though, so cleaned and sterilized and got slow nipples.
customer_reviews.author: W. Faris

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done...
customer_reviews.text: After one year of use these are good. They are fairly easy to hold. They are easy to pull apart for good cleaning, thus does take some time compared to bottles that cant be disassembled. It would be nice however if they came with extra nipples
customer_reviews.author: swayne

customer_reviews.title: They leak! I didn’t listen and all 10 of them thrown in the trash tonight!
customer_reviews.text: I thought I liked these bottles so bought 10 to rotate through daycare, but then about 2 weeks of using them...they started leaking on the bottom! I rechecked the deal after taking it apart when it started leaking and it continued to leak on the bottle! I ended up throwing away all 10 bottles tonight and decided to write my review! Bottles are not cheap and these were a big disappointment!
customer_reviews.author: LAHC

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: Love love love these bottles! Brilliant design and easy to clean! Love that these are shaped just so, so that my daughter gets every laat drop of her formula with having her at a 45 degree angle foe feeding. Seems to be preventing ear infections as well because we aren't havung to lay her down flat to get the last few mls
customer_reviews.author: Clinton Yada

customer_reviews.title: They work great for us
customer_reviews.text: I used these for my 1st so these were my go to for my 2nd. They work great for us. I don't have an issue with them leaking unless the bottom ring isn't placed correctly. Even then I readjust it, wipe it off, and it's good to go. My only negative is they are 9oz bottles but you can't really make a 9oz bottle due to the liquid going up when you add the powder formula. It would be better if there was extra room at the top so you can actually make 9oz in the bottle. I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: The only thing positive I have to say about these bottles is that they do work well for reducing gas .... If you put them together properly... These bottles are a pain in the butt to put together without leaks especially for a middle of the night feeding... Another negative is these bottles cannot be used without all of the pieces (there is a rubber piece that goes at the bottom to cover the vent) if you lose that piece the bottle is useless unless you want to pay an arm and a leg to replace the piece... I won't be purchasing these again
customer_reviews.author: DaMar Arnold

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with how Item was delivered
customer_reviews.text: I recently ordered this product and it states that a slow flow nipple comes with the bottles. When I received this item, it looked like the bottles had just been thrown in the box. I had already washed the item to use and then realized that the nipple that came with it, is a medium flow. It states specifically a slow flow nipple is supposed to come with it. It looks to me as if someone ordered this product, took the slow flow and replaced it with medium flow, and then returned the item
customer_reviews.author: Coach Dan Ramirez, LLC

customer_reviews.title: baby bottles
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these several months back and have been using them daily. Never experienced any leaking as described by other users. Light weight bottle makes feeding easier. The angle does reduce gas, no bubbles either. Will purchase more of this model
customer_reviews.author: Uriana Ponson

customer_reviews.title: Mamas everywhere!!!
customer_reviews.text: After going through so many brands and spending so much money, this is the bottle all my babies love. Also if you breast feed and are looking for a good transition, this nipple is resembling and makes for easy transition. Life savor
customer_reviews.author: Diana Kopp

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bottles!
customer_reviews.text: These are the only bottles my baby ever really liked. My baby is 11 months now and has been using these bottles ever since I found them when she was about 3 months old, and she's never had any issues with gas. I like how you can disassemble the entire bottle so you can clean them more thoroughly. They are also fairly inexpensive for a nice quality which is a huge plus! I've never had any issues with these bottles leaking. I would definitely recommend these bottles!
customer_reviews.author: Autumn

customer_reviews.title: Don't work for colicy babies.
customer_reviews.text: This didn't work for my daughter and her colic. We switched to MAM bottles and it's impoved so much. If your baby isn't colicy, these bottles are great. Very easy to clean and replace parts.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby Orlick

customer_reviews.title: Great for gas and colic
customer_reviews.text: I used these with my first kid and it helped so much with colic so I decided to buy again for my second kid and they worked like a charm. They are easy to clean and my daughter was able to hold these better than the munchkin latch’s we first bought
customer_reviews.author: Johnna F.

customer_reviews.title: Bottles
customer_reviews.text: I had one of these bottles and loved it, so I bought more. For some reason some of the bottles leaked (others didn't). I love the design of this bottle, but I may have gotten some that were defective and should have paid attention sooner to exchange, but had bought the bottles in advance before my baby could use and already threw away the packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Spratt

customer_reviews.title: Solved my baby's gas issues!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased another, more expensive brand prior to buying these and that brand did not help at all. A friend recommended the Playtex Anti-Colic brand and I immediately purchased. Anything to get my baby some relief. And it worked! Almost immediately. And there are less parts to clean on this bottle than previous brand bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Katia A Brown

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT For Greedy Chuggers.
customer_reviews.text: My 3 week old has struggled with his standard bottles, even the special brands. They caused painful hiccups, puking, and gas bubbles so intense he wouldn't burp and as a result had intense gas pain, and refused to sleep on his back. First time using this product, my son was able to drink without spitting up, had minor hiccups but falls asleep quickly and has no gas pains, resulting in the ability to sleep on his back. 10/10 would reccomend.
customer_reviews.author: Liz Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Leaks like dr brown bottles
customer_reviews.text: These bottles are horrible as far as leaking. They leak like dr browns. The bottle serves its purpose for acid reflux, colic etc but who wants dripping or a soaked baby because of the leaking? I personally don't recommend these mainly because of the leaking alone
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Nice bottles
customer_reviews.text: I love these bottles. The baby easily drinks his milk from these bottles even with a little cereal in them. They are easy to hold. I prefer these over Dr. Brown bottles. This is a great price for 5 good bottles
customer_reviews.author: satisfied customer

customer_reviews.title: I love these bottles!!
customer_reviews.text: I was using the Nuk perfect fit bottles and they were junk! Always leaked anytime you went to shake it up, and the lids never fit right. With these Playtex bottles, they do not leak and the lids fit snug. My baby usually has terrible gas and stomach pain but since switching to these she's been a lot happier. I will say these have more pieces than the Nuk bottles but still are not hard to clean like the Dr. Brown's. I highly recommend these bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Be careful
customer_reviews.text: The only thing about these bottle is that they could leak all your milk out if you don’t pay close attention and securethe bottom of the bottle. Frankly I’m over it but my baby is responding to the venting system so well that i guess I’ll keep using them.
customer_reviews.author: Nicky

customer_reviews.title: They work!
customer_reviews.text: I used these for my grandson several years ago, and knew that they really help those with tummy issues. Now I have a newborn granddaughter with re-flux issues. Again these nursers really are amazingly helpful.
customer_reviews.author: m k ledford

customer_reviews.title: Lifesavers!
customer_reviews.text: Bought them to try with our newborn twins. Reflux has gotten a lot better. Kinda tricky to clean because of the plastic bottom membrane, but still worth if your little ones have reflux.
customer_reviews.author: Marco

customer_reviews.title: GREAT FOR COLICY BABIES!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have a VERY gasy baby and no other bottles meant for colic work for her. These are amazing! I ended up buying more so I dont have to wash them very often. The only thing I dont like it you cannot put these in your bottle warmer without the vent on the bottom leaking but I have so many storage bottles that came with my breast pump that wasnt a problem.
customer_reviews.author: GameOn

customer_reviews.title: Colic eliminator.
customer_reviews.text: Sent these as a gift for my bestfriend! She loves these and her baby is calm and now this is the only brand she uses.
customer_reviews.author: Janae Williams

customer_reviews.title: DANGER!!! DO NOT PURCHASE!
customer_reviews.text: These bottles are horrible. I use a bottle warmer to heat up my 3 month of old daughters bottles. When I took the bottle out of the bottle warmer, hot water that seeped in the removable bottom burned my daughters skin when I lifted the bottle to feed her. She now has a burn mark on her chest from this bottle. DO NOT BUY! also hard to clean and easy to loose parts.
customer_reviews.author: jonetta

customer_reviews.title: Great bottles
customer_reviews.text: Love these bottles. But I'veonly used slow flow nipples. They are super easy to take apart and clean. You have to be careful putting them back together, but if done right, they don't leak. Will never use anything else
customer_reviews.author: Sarah M

customer_reviews.title: Amazing bottles, amazing brand
customer_reviews.text: Amazing bottles, amazing brand. Only issue is make sure the rubber in the bottom and the bottom pieces are completely dry or else you will have water running down the bottle into babies face. I will always give these at baby showers.
customer_reviews.author: Leah Vega

customer_reviews.title: Great bottle
customer_reviews.text: These are my baby’s favorite bottles. They can hold them themselves and the venting is really nice.
customer_reviews.author: L. Kanizay

customer_reviews.title: Other than that they're great. We use them daily without issue
customer_reviews.text: Only issue is that the nipple covers aren't exactly the same size as the other set of these bottles we have. They fit a little looser on the old bottles so we have to make sure we use the tight lids on the right bottles. Other than that they're great. We use them daily without issue.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: No complaints
customer_reviews.text: Brought this for a former coworker and she loves them. Easy to clean, hold and insert milk. Sometimes you gotta pay a little more for better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Big-Terri

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite bottle. Come completely apart making them super easy to clean and they dry really quickly. Easy for baby to hold.
customer_reviews.author: Cel

customer_reviews.title: Misleading photos
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t used the bottles.... the picture shown when buying these show 0+ flow and when you get them they are for 3+ .... very misleading information! I have a 4 week old so I highly doubt I’ll be able to use these yet.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Small

customer_reviews.title: Good bottles
customer_reviews.text: These are good bottles as I have bought them from a retail store before purchasing here since Amazon had a better deal. When I got them they had different prints on the bottles. I don't know if it's just playtex changing the look of their brand or I paid for a copy? I will update if they are different than the ones bought in store as they were pretty good so far.
customer_reviews.author: Realtra Dark

customer_reviews.title: This new model leaks from bottom
customer_reviews.text: The new model leaks water for the bottom, the old model does not.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Used these with my first child. Bought more for my second child. Love these bottles!
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bottles!
customer_reviews.text: Tried several brands....love these! Great bottles easy to take apart clean and put together
customer_reviews.author: Jessie

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Just began using cause accidentally got the bigger nipples and he loves his rice bottles with this
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Love these bottles!
customer_reviews.text: These bottles are amazing! Our little guy has acid reflux so finding a good bottle was very important. I tried several, but I finally found the playtex ventaire bottle and we love them! As he eats, air is pulled from the bottom of the bottle so there are no air bubbles going back up through the nipple....leading to less gas and less stomach aches, which mean LESS CRYING. I highly suggest these bottles.
customer_reviews.author: One Happy Mommy

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny, love them
customer_reviews.text: They are fantastic. Easy to assemble. Iike that I can wash inside really good because you can open up and down. As a mom they work great for me. My baby likes too. Only thing is that the nipples look little big for his little mouth. He doesn't open he's mouth wide so I always help him with my fingers. Quality is good so far, I wash and sterilize every day and also use dishwasher sometimes. Easy and light for a baby to hold. air comes out when bb drinks. you can hear the air from the bottom. Looks like it does the work.
customer_reviews.author: A Tall

customer_reviews.title: Hard to clean
customer_reviews.text: These bottles are alright. I know a lot of people who like them. I personally don't like them. They're a hastle to clean and it seems like no matter how much you scrub at the nipples and bottom rings they still smell like old milk. Even after being boiled. The performance of the bottle when feeding is fine. No leaks and he doesnt seem to be any gassier after eating. I just dont like feeding my son with stinky bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Kait

customer_reviews.title: Good Bottles for gassy baby
customer_reviews.text: Pros; Can hear the air escaping the bottom as baby eats Minimal bubbles Cons; Thick bottom makes heating in steam warmers take a lot longer than regular bottles
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Holiman

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: Most of the things I buy on Amazon are really the best but this but is the worst. After a day of using this bottle, the nipples cave in and deflate when my baby is feeding. Tried everything I could. I ordered a different nipple and still the problem persists. Now I have six bottles that I am unable to use. Total waste of my money.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia selase

customer_reviews.title: Normally awesome bottles. Bad batch
customer_reviews.text: I buy these bottles all the time this time every single one leaked out the bottom. I tried every trick in the book to fix. So disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Nicole S Strauss

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Only bottle my little one will take. Used them with my oldest and they still have the same quality they did back then
customer_reviews.author: Shae K.

customer_reviews.title: More parts to clean for same reflux results
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for bottles for my son who has reflux. I was using the Avent Anti-Colic bottles and thought these might help his reflux better. I didn’t notice any change in his reflux and these bottles had a lot more parts to clean. Ended up switching back to the Avent bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Bottle love!
customer_reviews.text: It was so hard finding a bottle that my baby liked until we found these bottles now she won't take any other bottle. These bottles feel so much better on my wrist than any other. My biggest complaint is these bottles are extremely hard to clean because of all it's tiny pieces, but is very worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Candace

customer_reviews.title: Best bottles🍼🍼🍼🍼🍼🍼
customer_reviews.text: These have been my babies favorite bottles ever since he was born! I have no complaints what so ever! They are very easy to clean!!!
customer_reviews.author: Yadira Tijero

customer_reviews.title: Well made and helps baby drink with less air bubbles.
customer_reviews.text: Grandbaby stays at our house. This is the top rated and recommended by her mom to keep at Gigi and Poppy's house. Mom researched the best of the best and we wanted to keep it all consistent. .
customer_reviews.author: Cousineaux6

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: We we're using Avent newborn bottles previously but our baby had a lot of spit up. We switched to these and the spit up was so minimal, I felt more comfortable increasing how much he was drinking.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to fill
customer_reviews.text: Loved these bottles and so did my first child. My favorite part is the neck opening was wide so it was easier to fill whether it was frozen breastmilk or formula powder. These are multiple parts but that is what made them work.Unfortunately, my set of twins didn't agree with my oldest. Miss these!
customer_reviews.author: Jofit5

customer_reviews.title: To allow proper venting for when your baby is sucking.
customer_reviews.text: Very good bottle would recommend it. It’s very important to thoroughly dry before you put them together To allow proper venting for when your baby is sucking.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie

customer_reviews.title: Great for gassy baby
customer_reviews.text: These bottles were a life saver! Along with a formula change, these bottles reduced my little ones discomfort and helped give us back our sanity. The only downside is the # of pieces to clean (6 including cap) so I would suggest purchasing enough for a days worth of feedings. This 5 pack comes with ALL MEDIUM FLOW nipples, not a combination as other reviews suggest.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda W

customer_reviews.title: My babies never had problems with colic or gas
customer_reviews.text: I like that I can detach the bottom for cleaning and yet it doesnt leak. I have used it for my two toddlers since they were newborns.
customer_reviews.author: Kanan

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful replacement for drop ins
customer_reviews.text: I was using playtex drop ins and was tired of buying the drop in replacements. These are a great alternative. And with 5 in a box that's all I need.
customer_reviews.author: kurt

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: I love these!!!!!! Used them 5yrs ago for my first, and now I'm using them for my second. I have no complaints! They're easy to clean and put back together. Worth every single penny.
customer_reviews.author: Meeko Flo

customer_reviews.title: Great for Breastfed baby's!
customer_reviews.text: PLAYTEX BOTTLES ARE THE ONLY BOTTLES THAT MY EXCLUSIVELY BREASTFED BABY WOULD TAKE. I GOT THESE AFTER USING THE DROPINS. HE LOVES THESE BOTTLES AND THEY ARE EASY TO HOLD. I LOVE HOW THE AIR ESCAPES OUT THE VENTS SO BABY DOES NOT GET GASSY OR FUSSY AFTER HIS FEEDINGS.
customer_reviews.author: christina price

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: The only bottles my daughter has ever used. Any time we'd use different brands, they'd scream and refuse to eat. Now that she's getting bigger, going up in size of her favorite bottles were the only choice.
customer_reviews.author: Stevie Rae

customer_reviews.title: 😪😭
customer_reviews.text: The worst baby bottle ever it makes my baby throw up all the time and gas.
customer_reviews.author: maitec morse

customer_reviews.title: Bottle leaked and melted
customer_reviews.text: I'm not confident these bottles really come from Playtex. Aside from saying "baby" instead of vent aire on the bottle I just had one basically leak into my bottle warmer and start to melt. I've had the vent aire ones for 4 weeks with no issues. I may just throw these out and order from Target again.
customer_reviews.author: Devon

customer_reviews.title: Great for reflux babies
customer_reviews.text: Love these bottles my daughter has refux so bad that she would choke and turn blue so scary these help a lot after trying ever bottle out there these are the ones we stuck with!
customer_reviews.author: A.wekly

customer_reviews.title: They're a real hassle and very annoying to deal with
customer_reviews.text: They leak a lot I always end up with milk on me or my child always ends up with milk all over him. I checked to make sure everything is put right and it is. They're a real hassle and very annoying to deal with.
customer_reviews.author: Karla flowers

customer_reviews.title: Great bottle
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my little one. Come apart and back together easily for cleanliness. 9 oz bottle makes for easy shaking to mix formula.
customer_reviews.author: wendy matthews

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: My niece was so please with the product. Good for newborns.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best bottles
customer_reviews.text: The only bottles that helped with my daughter's gas and reflux. We had tried all other recommended brands before this.
customer_reviews.author: A-Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these bottles and they are the only kind he will take. We love them.
customer_reviews.author: Mariah

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Bought these cause granddaughter has Acid reflex N was worried about her getting colic these work
customer_reviews.author: Trina Costello

customer_reviews.title: Slow flow is better when they have only milk!!.
customer_reviews.text: The twins was not ready for the medium flow nipples, so I had to get them the slow flow and they don't get chocked!!
customer_reviews.author: S.A.S.

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied Customer
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a gift so really can't review this.
customer_reviews.author: Aletha Lowry

customer_reviews.title: Great bottles
customer_reviews.text: I was worried about buying these because the photo didn’t match the title. But it was a 5 pack & I’m happy with my purchase. We enjoy these bottles a lot!
customer_reviews.author: Neela

customer_reviews.title: Great bottles
customer_reviews.text: My favorite kind of bottle. Will not use anything else
customer_reviews.author: Joanna

customer_reviews.title: These items were purchased for my grandson. He had ...
customer_reviews.text: These items were purchased for my grandson. He had been regurgitating quite a bit after eating. After using these products, that appeared to happen a lot less.
customer_reviews.author: Tee Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Great bottles, but includes medium flow nipples.
customer_reviews.text: Great replacement bottles for my toddler. Love the design. Only wished these came with fast flow nipples. Great bottles, but includes medium flow nipples.
customer_reviews.author: Sam K

customer_reviews.title: Flow advertisement not correct
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product because we needed more slow flow nipples and this was a great price for extra bottles as well. In the picture it shows 0M+ with one droplet highlighted. When I received the bottles they are medium flow 3M+. This is not accurate advertisement.
customer_reviews.author: Lynette Rowley

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: We struggled and struggled feeding my son and then a friend bought me these bottles to try and they were a blessing. We went from screaming and crying and projectile, and soaking a bib and burp cloth at almost every feeding to now not even needing a bib or burp cloth. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: K Beard

customer_reviews.title: Wish it didn't leak!
customer_reviews.text: Not what we wanted!!! Was hoping for a brand that really provided a clear understanding on what they actually offered.
customer_reviews.author: Yup Yea Yes!

customer_reviews.title: Great bottles and a great price!
customer_reviews.text: The feeding angle is great and they are just the right size.
customer_reviews.author: J Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Did NOT come with slow flow nipples.
customer_reviews.text: Would have given 5 starts but... the box advertised slow flow nipples and so did the questions/answers. These came with medium flow and now I have to order all new nipples for these bottles in order for my newborn to use them.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Michael

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: We have tried multiple bottles and these are by far our favorite. The baby loves them too! ;-) My son was breastfed for the first 4 months and had no issues transitioning with these bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Greatest bottle ever
customer_reviews.text: We love these bottles for our daughter, less air then others, the shape of the nipple made it easier to transition from boob
customer_reviews.author: EA2

product_meta.title: Playtex 05226 Baby Ventaire Anti Colic Baby Bottle, BPA Free, 9 Ounce - 5 Pack
product_meta.description: The Playtex Venture Advanced 9-oz. Wide Bottles are clinically proven to reduce gas, colic and spit-up. The unique bottom vent allows air to enter without mixing with the liquids as your baby drinks. The angled design promotes the semi-upright feeding position recommended by pediatricians to help prevent ear infections. The advanced venting system is designed to help liquid flow consistently, and the wide design makes it ideal for moms who are breast-feeding and/or bottle-feeding. These bottles are BPA and phthalate free for your baby's safety.
feature_bullets: Bottom vent helps reduce air ingestion
Angled design promotes upright feeding, recommended by pediatricians to help prevent ear infections
Micro channel vents keep air at the back of the bottle as baby drinks
Always BPA free. Dishwasher-safe top rack only

specifications.Bottle nipple type: Ventaire Angled design and Naturalatch silicone nipple
